sentence.Network_en: Leaf blade base cuneate, abaxial surface with gray - white indumentum; corolla magenta - rose.
sentence.Network_cn: 背面用 灰白色 的毛被, 叶片基部楔形; 花冠红色苯胺染料玫瑰色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: C ... cumulative 累积的，渐进的 cuneate 楔形的 cupel 烤钵，灰皿，灰吹盘.
楔形(cuneate) 叶片在近叶柄处渐变狭，两边一同趋向基部呈楔子，如垂柳。　　截形(truncate) 在叶柄两侧的叶片平截，近乎成一直线…
Leaf blade cuneate or obtuse ; bark gray with sparse spots ., 叶片基部楔形或钝 ; 树皮灰色的具稀的斑点.

list.abs: ...和楔束向上延伸，在第四脑室下端，薄、楔束分别扩展为膨隆的薄束结节（gracile tubercle）和楔束结节（cuneate tubercle），其深面有薄束核和楔束核。小脑下脚（inferior cerebellar peduncle）为一粗.
cumulative selection 累积选择cuneate nucleus 楔状核-
crus cerebri 大脑脚底cuneate nucleus 楔束核cuneate tubercle 楔束结节
base cuneate or broadly cuneate ; apex tapering or acuminate ;, 基部楔形或宽楔形先端渐狭或渐尖;
base obliquely cuneate , margin dentate , apex caudate ., 基部斜楔形的 , 边缘具牙齿 , 先端尾状.

means.word_mean: 1. of a leaf shape; narrowly triangular, wider at the apex and tapering toward the base
